subject: Re: US AMBASSADOR TO NIGERIA
body:
US AMBASSADOR TO NIGERIA
11 GARKI ROAD ABUJA, NIGGERIA
TEL:  +234-9070022703
Email    (office846323@gmail.com )-

ATTN: Helene

 I RECEIVED YOUR MAIL

LISTEN CAREFULLY,  BEFORE I START COMING TO YOUR HOME ADDRESS TO MEET YOU
WITH YOUR CONSIGNMENT WHICH CONTAIN ($10MILLION) MUST BE REGISTERED AS AN
AMBASSADORIAL  LUGGAGE FOR ME TO DEFEAT ALL ODDS AND WITH THE INSURANCE
COVERAGE FEE THAT WILL GOING TO COST  YOU A TOTAL SUM OF  $5,500.00 Only TO
ENABLE ME START MAKING ARRANGEMENT TO MEET YOU IN YOUR ADDRESS


NOTE THAT IF YOU CANNOT PAY  THE FEE THAT MEANS I WILL DROP YOUR
CONSIGNMENT AND MOVE  WITH SOME BENEFICIARY WHO ARE WILLING TO PAY THE
FEE,  NOTE  THAT THIS IS THE ONLY FEE YOU ARE PAYING IN THIS
TRANSACTION  SO I WILL ADVISE YOU TO TRY AND COMPLY WITH ME TO ENABLE ME
MEET YOU TO HANDLE YOU OVER YOUR CONSIGNMENT BOX.


BE  INFORMED THAT AS SOON AS YOU PAY THE FEE I  WILL SEND YOU MY FLIGHT
SCHEDULE ON MY ARRIVAL IN THE NEAR AIRPORT IN YOUR COUNTRY, SO ONCE I
RECIEVE YOUR RETURN  EMAIL I WILL SEND YOU  THE ACCOUNT INFORMATIONS ON HOW
YOU WILL MAKE THE PAYMENT TO ENABLE ME REGISTER YOUR BOX AS AN
AMBASSADORIAL  LUGGAGE AND AS WELL  ENSURE YOUR  CONSIGNMENT WITH INSURANCE
COMPANY AND START COMING TO AVOID  ANY FURTHER DELAY.

AS SOON AS EVERYTHING IS DONE I WILL SEND YOU A COPY OF THE INSURANCE
COVERAGE BOND CERTIFICATE WITH THE PAYMENT RECIEPT FOR YOUR OWN VIEW AND
SAFE KEEPING FOR PRESENTATION TO ME DURING MY ARRIVAL TO YOUR DOORSTEP.

YOU ARE THEREBY ADVICE TO RESPOND IMMEDIATELY YOUR RECIEVE THIS MAIL TO LET
ME KNOW IF YOU ARE PAYING THE REQUESTED FEE SO THAT I WILL KNOW WHAT NEXT
TO DO OR CALL ME AS SOON AS YOU READ MY MAIL .

I WILL BE HOPPING TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON!

THANK YOU.
BEST REGARDS.
UNITED STATE OF AMERICA AMBASSADOR
Richard Merrill Mills Jr
Call : +234-9070022703
WhatsApp: 08140504284
